name: C# (.NET) & Docker & Kubernetes
postCreateCommand: dotnet restore && code --install-extension ms-dotnettools.csharp && code --install-extension ms-azuretools.vscode-docker && code --install-extension ms-kubernetes-tools.vscode-kubernetes-tools && echo 'terminal.integrated.shell.linux=/bin/bash' >> /root/.vscode-remote/data/Machine/settings.json
